Description:
Finishing Design Services Limited - 3 x INs served re HSWA/COSHH/MHSW

312360875
IN/2022/3/17/SL1

You failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health namely Metalworking fluid (MWF) is either prevented or adequately controlled.

312360903
IN/2022/3/17/SL2

You have failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health namely Welding Fume is either prevented or adequately controlled.

312360941
IN/2022/3/17/SL3

You have failed to make appropriate effective arrangements for the planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventative and protective measures for the control of water-mix metal working fluids.
